General.Name: Hubei Huaqiang High-Tech Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Hubei Huaqiang High-Tech Co., Ltd. manufactures rubber stoppers in China. The company's products include personal protective equipment, such as anti-virus clothing and gas masks; collective protective equipment comprising cooperative supporting products and demobilized troops products; cooperative supporting products, including pre-filters, air inlet components, particle filters, filter absorbers, and poison-filtering ventilation devices; and integrated and released troops products consisting of large collective protection systems. It also offers pharmaceutical packaging and medical device products, such as medicinal butyl rubber stoppers, multi-layer co-extruded films, medical masks, and medical protective clothing; pharmaceutical butyl rubber stopper products comprising conventional rubber stoppers, film-coated rubber stoppers, and rubber components for prefilled syringes; and medical disposable protective clothing, disposable medical masks, medical surgical masks, medical protective masks, and other medical protective products. The company was founded in 1966 and is based in Yichang, China.
